clauses.title: Payment Terms
clauses.summary: Annual payment due within 30 days of invoice date
clauses.content: Payment shall be made annually in advance, due within thirty (30) days of invoice date.

clauses.title: Termination Rights
clauses.summary: Either party may terminate with 90 days written notice
clauses.content: Either party may terminate this agreement with ninety (90) days written notice.

insights.title: Auto-renewal clause
insights.description: Contract automatically renews unless terminated 90 days before expiry
insights.recommendation: Set calendar reminder 120 days before expiry date

insights.title: Volume discount available
insights.description: Contract includes tiered pricing for additional licenses
insights.recommendation: Consider purchasing additional licenses to unlock volume discounts

clauses.title: Service Level Agreement
clauses.summary: 99.9% uptime guarantee with service credits for downtime
clauses.content: Provider guarantees 99.9% uptime with service credits for any downtime exceeding this threshold.

insights.title: Contract expires soon
insights.description: Contract expires in 45 days without renewal

clauses.title: Performance Metrics
clauses.summary: Minimum 15% increase in qualified leads quarterly
clauses.content: Service provider commits to delivering a minimum 15% quarterly increase in qualified leads.

insights.title: Performance penalties unclear
insights.description: Contract lacks clear penalties for underperformance
insights.recommendation: Negotiate specific penalty clauses for next renewal

clauses.title: Rent Escalation
clauses.summary: Annual rent increase of 3% starting year 2
clauses.content: Base rent shall increase by three percent (3%) annually beginning in the second year of the term.

insights.title: Early termination option
insights.description: Contract allows early termination with 6 months notice and penalty fee
insights.recommendation: Consider exercising if planning to downsize office space

clauses.title: Data Breach Response
clauses.summary: 24/7 incident response team with 2-hour response time
clauses.content: Provider maintains 24/7 incident response team with guaranteed 2-hour response time for security incidents.

insights.title: Expired security contract
insights.description: Critical security services contract has expired
insights.recommendation: Renew immediately or find alternative security provider
